ai.summary: Cow Lane is an easy 1.4 km stroll in the UK, ideal for beginners and families. The route offers a gentle surface and minimal elevation, making it a quick, relaxed outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-trodden paths with short sections of grass or gravel. Light mud possible after rain; good footwear recommended. Scenic but with minimal elevation changes.
ai.safety_notes: This is a short, easy route, but always check the weather before you go. Watch for uneven ground near gates and any rural traffic. Bring water, a charged mobile phone, and appropriate clothing. Supervise children around road crossings and farm entrances; carry a small first aid kit if desired.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or GPS
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; the route is pleasant in milder months, and can be done in winter with appropriate footwear and waterproofs.

seo.title: Cow Lane – Easy 1.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Cow Lane, an easy 1.4 km hike in the UK. Flat terrain, family-friendly route with minimal elevation. Safety tips and gear included.
